summary.en: Verb with two forms: schaffen–schaffte–geschafft = manage; regional: work. schaffen–schuf–geschaffen = create. Also: to bring/move. Note: jdm. zu schaffen machen = to trouble sb.
summary.cn: 动词，弱变化=完成/办到；南德口语=工作；强变化=创造；亦指把…送至/搬到。注意：jdm. zu schaffen machen=使某人困扰/为难。

meanings.en: to manage; to get something done (weak: schaffte, geschafft)

examples.en: Can you get it done by tomorrow?

meanings.en: to create; to bring into existence (strong: schuf, geschaffen)
meanings.cn: 创造；使产生（强变化：schuf, geschaffen）

examples.de: Die Künstlerin hat ein neues Werk geschaffen.
examples.en: The artist has created a new work.
examples.cn: 这位女艺术家创作了新作品。
改革创造了新的就业岗位。

meanings.en: to bring/carry/get someone or something somewhere; to move/transport (colloquial)

examples.de: Kannst du die Kisten in den Keller schaffen?
examples.en: Can you carry the boxes to the basement?
examples.cn: 你能把箱子搬到地下室吗？

examples.de: Er schaffte den Verletzten ins Krankenhaus.
examples.en: He got the injured person to the hospital.

examples.de: Wir müssen das Gerät schnell in die Werkstatt schaffen.
examples.en: We need to get the device to the workshop quickly.
examples.cn: 我们得赶快把设备送到修理厂。

meanings.en: to work (regional, esp. southern Germany; colloquial)
meanings.cn: 工作（地区用法，尤指德南；口语）

examples.de: Ich muss heute bis spät schaffen.
examples.en: I have to work late today.

meanings.en: to wear out/exhaust (colloquial, often with objects like heat, stress)
meanings.cn: 使筋疲力尽；耗垮（口语，常用于热、压力等主语）

examples.en: The heat is wearing me out.

collocations.cn: 建立信任/创造清晰/建立秩序

collocations.en: to trouble/bother sb.; to be a burden to sb.

related_words.en: to cope with; to overcome; to manage
to manage to do; to get done
